name: SUPERMEGA FANGAME
description:
???DONATIONS????
Not gonna sugar coat it here, I really really need money. If you like this game and want to see more things like it in the future, please donate to my Kofi @ https://ko-fi.com/jbrooksdev

...CREDITS...
https://twitter.com/jbrooksdev
Design, Programming, Animation and Music by JBROOKSDEV
Original Art Assets courtesy of CANARIGAMES, redesigned by JBROOKSDEV

!!!GAME DESCRIPTION!!!
50 MATTS. 50 RYANS. NO MERCY.
Play 1 to 4 local players (if you have enough controllers) and fight to survive in a battle to the death. Each kill shrinks the ring around the map until it only one side is left.

Spectator mode - If you just want to watch, you can set the player count to zero and just watch the Matts and Ryans kill each other.

CONTROLS - Mouse and Keyboard:
Arrow Keys to move.
X to Attack.
Z to Roll.
C to Swap Weapons.
S to Drop Weapon.

CONTROLS - Controller (Xbox):
Left Stick to move.
A to Attack.
B to Roll.
X to Swap Weapons.
Y to Drop Weapon.
